content: What popular toy consists of colorful interlocking plastic bricks and various other parts that can be assembled and reassembled into countless configurations?

Ah, you're thinking about that iconic toy that's been around for generations, capturing the imagination of both children and adults alike. It's made up of those distinctive colorful plastic bricks that snap together with a satisfying click. People have built some amazing structures and models with them— from simple houses and cars to intricate replicas of real-world buildings and even functional machines. It's amazing how something so simple can inspire such creativity and problem-solving skills. I think it's one of those toys that never really goes out of style because it's so versatile and enduring. What is it called again?
